welcome_phrase:
Welcome to Synchrowise
Let's get started
reset_your_password_desc: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
almost_done_desc: You can finish your registration by selecting a username and avatar
what_would_you_like_to_do: What would you like to do?
create_a_group_description: Create a new group to invite your friends!
join_a_group_description: Join a group to to meet your friends!
something_went_wrong_desc: Something went wrong ðŸ˜•. Please tap to retry.
username_description: Choose a username that you would like to use. Other users will see you with this username.
username_must_be_at_least_min_characters: Username must be at least {min} characters
avatar_desc: Choose an avatar that you would like to use. Other users will see you with this avatar.
account_disabled: This is user account is disabled
group_key_desc: Choose a group key that you would like to use. Other users will join your group with this unique key.
delete_your_account_desc: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
group_key_must_be_at_least_min_character: Group key must be at least {min} characters
group_desc_subtitle: Choose a group description that you would like to use. Other users will see this description when they join your group.
signout_desc: Are you sure you want to sign out?
join_group_desc: Join a group to to meet your friends!
delete_group_desc: Are you sure you want to delete the group?
